projects.description: A random quote generator to practice iteration and basic JavaScript concepts. Quote and background are chosen at random via timer or button press.

Utilizes progress enchancement and unobtrusive JavaScript to create a user-friendly directory. Code works with any number of students to generate pages and display 10 at a time. Search bar actively filters students during typing.

Make sure you sign up for the JavaScript Conference! This project practices HTML form elements and associated JavaScript to create a friendly user-experience. Error messages will appear if any field is left blank upon submission, and radio buttons will disable competing time slots to ensure users will not sign up for overlapping programs.
'Hangman'-inspired web game that utilizes object-oriented JavaScript. Try to guess the phrase with fewer than 5 missed letters! Phrase is randomly generated each game from a local array.

Uses a public random personnel generator API to create a mock employee directory. When clicked, a modal window with additional information will display. Search bar filters displayed employees upon submission.
